metadata.description: The Company Prefix that will be at the beginning of each resource in Azure. (Must be 8 or less characters in length)
Do you want to use an Azure Managed Domain and allow user to log in with their email addresses?
The Address Space of the Companies current network on VMware/On-Prem
The External address for the VPN to connect to. If in VMware leave as SonicWall Address, if On-Prem change to Public IP Address.
The Shared Key for the VPN Connection between VMware and Azure.  (Must be at least 10 character long)
The Local Admin Password for the VMs.  (Must be at least 12 character long)
The Number of DC Servers (Domain Controller). **This does not apply if Domain Services is 'true'.**
The Windows OS Version for the DC Servers.
The Number of RDS Servers (Remote Desktop Services).
The Windows OS Version for the RDS Servers.
The Number of FS Servers (File Server).
The Windows OS Version for the FS Servers.
The Number of SQL Servers (SQL Server).
The Windows OS Version for the SQL Servers.
The Number of Custom Server Names you want. - i.e A Server with a different name than above.
The Windows OS Version for the Custom Servers.
Enter the name you want for the servers. Enter the name inside [] and put '' around the name, if you have more than one, put a comma in between.  i.e  ['DOMAIN-SRV-01','DOMAIN-SRV-02']
The Size of the RDS Servers.
Server to attach Data Disk to. (FS recommended)
The size of Data Disk to attach.
